name: Barro F22
description:
Note: The F version does not contain jumping like on the normal version.

Barro F22 is the new generation for the fast version of Barro, now with a new style of race tracks but, with the good old toy car/ go kart arcade style!

  • 10 cars
  • 11 new race tracks
  • Improved time trial (Leaderboard lap-by-lap | Fight for your position in real time!)
  • Single player
  • Up to 4 players local split screen
  • Up to 20 cars on the grid
